name: CharlotteGuide
0:
”Alexa, ask charlotte guide where should I go”
”charlotte overview”
”the top five”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: charlotte guide
des: Charlotte Guide provides you with an overview of the city of Charlotte. You can also use this app to get information about things to do in the city and places to visit. This app will help you plan your trip to Charlotte, NC and make sure that you are well educated about the city.
